positions.title: SDE
description: Developed and optimized scalable, responsive web applications using React.js, JavaScript, and CSS, enhancing UI/UX.
Integrated WebSocket for real-time updates and chat functionality, improving user engagement.
Integrated JWT and OAuth 2.0 for secure authentication and authorization, ensuring robust access control for users.
Strengthened web security by using cookies to safeguard session data and implemented CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions for automated deployment
